nodes.text: Shorjin Challas was a male scientist and a member of the elite Lumenatus Club living during the Galactic War, who wrote a thesis on planetary shielding mechanics. He helped a recent addition to the Club Tharan Cedrax by providing him a power core required for the experimental Vandrayk Generator.
Shorjin Challas is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Tharan Cedrax companion storyline.
